Package controller

Class ManagerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.ManagerController
  • public class ManagerController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for Manager-specific operations in the BTO system. Handles project management, application processing, officer assignments, and various reporting functions that managers are responsible for.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ManagerController()
      Default constructor for the manager controller.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ManagerController

        public ManagerController()
        Default constructor for the manager controller.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllProjects

        public java.util.ArrayList<Project> getAllProjects()
        Retrieves all projects in the system regardless of visibility status. Managers have full access to view all projects, including hidden ones.
        Returns:
        Complete list of all projects in the database

      • getFilteredProjects

        public java.util.ArrayList<Project> getFilteredProjects​(Filter filter)
        Retrieves projects that match the specified filter criteria. Allows managers to search for projects based on various attributes.
        Parameters:
        filter - The search criteria to apply when filtering projects
        Returns:
        List of projects that match the filter criteria

      • getManagedProjects

        public java.util.ArrayList<Project> getManagedProjects​(Manager manager)
        Retrieves all projects managed by a specific manager. Used to show managers only the projects they're responsible for.
        Parameters:
        manager - The manager whose projects should be retrieved
        Returns:
        List of projects assigned to the specified manager

      • editProject

        public boolean editProject​(Project project,
                           java.lang.String projectName,
                           java.lang.String neighborhood,
                           java.time.LocalDate applicationStartDate,
                           java.time.LocalDate applicationEndDate,
                           java.util.ArrayList<FlatType> flatTypes)
        Updates an existing project with new information. Allows managers to edit project details as needed.
        Parameters:
        project - The project to be modified
        projectName - Updated name for the project
        neighborhood - Updated neighborhood location
        applicationStartDate - Updated application start date
        applicationEndDate - Updated application end date
        flatTypes - Updated list of flat types available in the project
        Returns:
        true if the update was successful, false otherwise

      • deleteProject

        public boolean deleteProject​(Project project)
        Removes a project from the system. Should only be used for projects with no active applications.
        Parameters:
        project - The project to be deleted
        Returns:
        true if deletion was successful, false otherwise

      • updateProjectVisibility

        public boolean updateProjectVisibility​(Project project,
                                       VisibilityEnum visibility)
        Changes the visibility state of a project. Controls whether the project appears in applicant search results.
        Parameters:
        project - The project whose visibility should be modified
        visibility - The new visibility state to set
        Returns:
        true if update was successful, false otherwise

      • createProject

        public Project createProject​(Manager manager,
                             java.lang.String projectName,
                             java.lang.String neighborhood,
                             java.time.LocalDate applicationStartDate,
                             java.time.LocalDate applicationEndDate,
                             int officerSlots,
                             VisibilityEnum visibility)
        Creates a new housing project in the system. Validates project parameters and manager availability before creation.
        Parameters:
        manager - The manager who will oversee this project
        projectName - Name of the new project
        neighborhood - Location/area of the project
        applicationStartDate - Date when applications will begin
        applicationEndDate - Date when applications will close
        officerSlots - Number of officers needed for this project
        visibility - Initial visibility status for the project
        Returns:
        The newly created Project object, or null if creation failed

      • getApplicationsByProject

        public java.util.ArrayList<BTOApplication> getApplicationsByProject​(Project project)
        Retrieves applications for a specific project. Helps managers focus on applications for projects they oversee.
        Parameters:
        project - The project to get applications for
        Returns:
        List of BTO applications for the specified project

      • processApplication

        public boolean processApplication​(BTOApplication application,
                                  boolean approve)
        Processes a BTO application approval or rejection. Managers use this to determine which applicants qualify for flats.
        Parameters:
        application - The application to process
        approve - Whether to approve or reject the application
        Returns:
        true if processing was successful, false otherwise

      • processWithdrawal

        public boolean processWithdrawal​(BTOApplication application,
                                 boolean approved)
        Processes a withdrawal request from an applicant. Allows managers to approve or reject requested withdrawals.
        Parameters:
        application - The application with a withdrawal request
        approved - Whether to approve or reject the withdrawal
        Returns:
        true if processing was successful, false otherwise

      • getOfficerApplicationsByProject

        public java.util.ArrayList<OfficerApplication> getOfficerApplicationsByProject​(Project project)
        Retrieves officer applications for a specific project. Shows which officers have applied to work on a particular project.
        Parameters:
        project - The project to get officer applications for
        Returns:
        List of officer applications for the specified project

      • processOfficerApplication

        public boolean processOfficerApplication​(OfficerApplication application,
                                         boolean approved)
        Processes an officer's application to work on a project. Managers use this to build their project teams.
        Parameters:
        application - The officer application to process
        approved - Whether to approve or reject the application
        Returns:
        true if processing was successful, false otherwise
